findings.title: Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting with Solidity v0.8+. The compiler now has built-in overflow checking.

findings.title: Commented Code
findings.description: Remove commented code for enhanced clarity and maintainability of the codebase.

findings.title: Cached Array Length
findings.description: It is more gas efficient to cache the array length in a local variable and use that variable instead of accessing it directly within a loop.
